TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Marekrek_kiwkay, title = Marekrek_kiwkay, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Marekrek_kiwkay} }

S.FORM: == Marekrek kiwkay ciwlo kiwkay == I 1956 (45) miheca patireng to kilang a kiwkay, pipacakatan itiya ira ci Huang Qingfeng , Song Zhengqing , Wang Mingrong aci Lin Jinming foksi, ciwlo ira ci Zhang Ayuan , Huang Jiamao . 7 ko laloma'an no mitooray salikaka. 1957 (46) miheca misingkiw to ciwlo ci Cai Yuqing aci Hu Qinghai ko matoro'ay. Sicuci matoro'ay ci Wang Maoxiong . 1 miheca ci Lin Jinming sinkiwsi itini itiya. 1958 (47) miheca pakalitemoh to faliyos, maloyoh ko kiwkay. Saan miliyaw patireng aca, itiya ci Zhuo Xinde foksi ko matayalay i kiwkay. 1959 (48) miheca ci Song Zhengqing foksi ko mikeriday to pisingkiw to ciwlo to sicuci, matoro'ay a ciwlo ci Cai Yuqing aci Hu Qinghai tatosa, o sicuci matoro'ay ci Wang Maoxiong aci Pan Cunci tatosa, itiya ira ko 10 laloma'an mitooray salikaka, ci Qiu Wenji sinkiwsi ko matayalay to 1 miheca ira ko 6 folad itiya. 1963 (52) miheca miliyaw misingkiw to ciwlo ato sicuci, ciwlo ci Zhang Shiliang aci Wang Maoxiong ko matoro'ay, sicuci ci Pan Cunci aci Pan Zhihao tatosa. Ci Wu Qingyun foksi ko matayalay i kiwkay, ira ko 11 laloma'an mitooray salikaka. 1967 (56) miheca, miliyaw misingkiw to ciwlo ato sicuci, ci Wu Qingyun foksi ko mikeriday, o ciwlo ci Wang Maoxiong aci Lin Huosheng tatosa matoro'ay. O sicuci ci Huang Fusheng aci Lin Gaotian tatosa ko matoro'ay. Ira ko 16 laloma'an ko mitooray salikaka. 1973 (62) miheca 9 folad misingkiw to ciwlo ato sicuci, ci Xu Yidu foksi ko mikeriday, maalaay ciwlo ci Wang Maoxiong aci Lin Huosheng tatosa matoro'ay, sicuci ira ci Lin Gaotian aci Pan Zhihao tatosa ko matoro'ay itiya. 1975 (64) miheca 1 folad 5 romi'ad, mipatireng ci Hong Chuanxing sinkisian, mikihatiyaay foksi ira ci Xu Yidu , Wu Jianfeng , Wu Qingyun , Lin Rongfa , Lian Zhongyi , Lin Maosong , Qiu Wenji ko mikihatiyaay itiya. 1976 (65) miheca 10 folad 5 romi'ad, ci Lin Rongfa foksi ko mikeriday to pipaino' to wawa ato mikerid to pitahekaan a lihay. 1977 (66) miheca 9 folad 10 romi'ad, ci Lian Zhongyi foksi ko mikeriday to pipaino' ato pitaheka a lihay. 1978 (67) miheca 9 folad 5 romi'ad, ci Wang Mingrong foksi ko mikeriday to pipaino' ato pitahekaan a lihay. Miliyaw misingkiw to ciwlo ato sicuci, ciwlo maalaay ci You Wenji aci Gao Gibbon ko matoro'ay, sicuci ci Pan Zhihao aci Lin Qingmei tatosa ko matoro'ay. O mitooray salikaka no kiwkay ira ko 18 no laloma'an. Aniniay ciwlo ato sicuci (2021-2025) 4 miheca a lekad. Ciwlo: Chen Tiancai, Chen Chunmei, Lin Xiufang, Zhong Yi. Sicuci: Tian Hanmei, Li Yuhua, Gao Wenxiong, Huang Yucheng Laloma'an no mitooray: 15 loma'. Tamdaw no mitooray: 36 tamdaw. Sa'opo no tamdaw: Pilihayan: salongan 16 ko tamdaw no pilihay. Ka'emangay: 4 tamdaw. Kitokay: 8 tamdaw. Hamong to loma': 9 tamdaw. Focinkay: pacena'.

== Marekrek kiwkay ciwlo kiwkay == I 1956 (45) miheca patireng to kilang a kiwkay, pipacakatan itiya ira ci Hoang Qingfeng , Song Zhengqing , Wang Mingrong aci Lin Jinming foksi, ciwlo ira ci Zhang Ayoan , Hoang Jiamao . 7 ko laloma'an no mitooray salikaka. 1957 (46) miheca misingkiw to ciwlo ci Cai Yoqing aci Ho Qinghai ko matoro'ay. Sicoci matoro'ay ci Wang Maoxiong . 1 miheca ci Lin Jinming sinkiwsi itini itiya. 1958 (47) miheca pakalitemoh to faliyos, maloyoh ko kiwkay. Saan miliyaw patireng aca, itiya ci Zhoo Xinde foksi ko matayalay i kiwkay. 1959 (48) miheca ci Song Zhengqing foksi ko mikeriday to pisingkiw to ciwlo to sicoci, matoro'ay a ciwlo ci Cai Yoqing aci Ho Qinghai tatosa, o sicoci matoro'ay ci Wang Maoxiong aci Pan Conci tatosa, itiya ira ko 10 laloma'an mitooray salikaka, ci Qio Wenji sinkiwsi ko matayalay to 1 miheca ira ko 6 folad itiya. 1963 (52) miheca miliyaw misingkiw to ciwlo ato sicoci, ciwlo ci Zhang Shiliang aci Wang Maoxiong ko matoro'ay, sicoci ci Pan Conci aci Pan Zhihao tatosa. Ci Wo Qingyon foksi ko matayalay i kiwkay, ira ko 11 laloma'an mitooray salikaka. 1967 (56) miheca, miliyaw misingkiw to ciwlo ato sicoci, ci Wo Qingyon foksi ko mikeriday, o ciwlo ci Wang Maoxiong aci Lin Hoosheng tatosa matoro'ay. O sicoci ci Hoang Fosheng aci Lin Gaotian tatosa ko matoro'ay. Ira ko 16 laloma'an ko mitooray salikaka. 1973 (62) miheca 9 folad misingkiw to ciwlo ato sicoci, ci Xo Yido foksi ko mikeriday, maalaay ciwlo ci Wang Maoxiong aci Lin Hoosheng tatosa matoro'ay, sicoci ira ci Lin Gaotian aci Pan Zhihao tatosa ko matoro'ay itiya. 1975 (64) miheca 1 folad 5 romi'ad, mipatireng ci Hong Choanxing sinkisian, mikihatiyaay foksi ira ci Xo Yido , Wo Jianfeng , Wo Qingyon , Lin Rongfa , Lian Zhongyi , Lin Maosong , Qio Wenji ko mikihatiyaay itiya. 1976 (65) miheca 10 folad 5 romi'ad, ci Lin Rongfa foksi ko mikeriday to pipaino' to wawa ato mikerid to pitahekaan a lihay. 1977 (66) miheca 9 folad 10 romi'ad, ci Lian Zhongyi foksi ko mikeriday to pipaino' ato pitaheka a lihay. 1978 (67) miheca 9 folad 5 romi'ad, ci Wang Mingrong foksi ko mikeriday to pipaino' ato pitahekaan a lihay. Miliyaw misingkiw to ciwlo ato sicoci, ciwlo maalaay ci Yoo Wenji aci Gao Gibbon ko matoro'ay, sicoci ci Pan Zhihao aci Lin Qingmei tatosa ko matoro'ay. O mitooray salikaka no kiwkay ira ko 18 no laloma'an. Aniniay ciwlo ato sicoci (2021-2025) 4 miheca a lekad. Ciwlo: Chen Tiancai, Chen Chonmei, Lin Xiofang, Zhong Yi. Sicoci: Tian Hanmei, Li Yohoa, Gao Wenxiong, Hoang Yocheng Laloma'an no mitooray: 15 loma'. Tamdaw no mitooray: 36 tamdaw. Sa'opo no tamdaw: Pilihayan: salongan 16 ko tamdaw no pilihay. Ka'emangay: 4 tamdaw. Kitokay: 8 tamdaw. Hamong to loma': 9 tamdaw. Focinkay: pacena'.
